attributes.action: Defibrillators to be issued to all grassroots sports teams.
attributes.additional_details: More and more cases of undetected heart conditions causing massive heart attacks in children and young adults.
attributes.background: Allow funding for defibrillators to be allocated to every grass roots sports club/team across the UK, which will allow local communities access also.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588667
